data_value.name: text
data_value.about_eula_statement_label: We regularly update the EULA and encourage you to visit this page www.copilotlive.com/EULA to view our latest EULA applicable to Your Software.
data_value.af_progress2: 1. Integrating roads to avoid and favor...
data_value.already_licensed: You are currently licensed for this feature which will expire in %s.^^Would you like to extend your current subscription now?
data_value.already_licensed_max: You have already installed this feature on 5 devices. Would you like to purchase a new license for this device?
data_value.already_licensed_max_time: Your subscription is already licensed for 3 years and cannot be extended.
data_value.altroute_not_allowed: This feature is unavailable on your device
data_value.application_idle: CoPilot has been idle for quite a while. To save battery power, CoPilot is going to be closed.

data_value.coordinates_invalid: There is no map data on the latitude and longitude you entered, please try again.

data_value.copilot_opening_browser: CoPilot is attempting to access an external website. This will cause CoPilot to close. Do you wish to continue?
data_value.cpstore_generic_error: Error detected in CoPilot Store. Unable to complete actions at this time.
data_value.cpstore_no_products: There are no products available for purchase at this time.
data_value.cpstore_no_products_from_store: Unable to retrieve products to purchase from the store. Please check your internet connection and retry

data_value.cpstore_order_not_found_apple: Unable to validate purchase with iTunes.
data_value.cpstore_purchase_complete: activated successfully. What would you like to do next?
data_value.cpstore_purchase_disabled: In App purchases are currently disabled on this device.
data_value.cpstore_purchase_disabled_android: In App purchases are currently disabled on this device. Please try manually opening the Market app, then restarting CoPilot.
data_value.critical_battery_power: Battery is too low to run CoPilot. CoPilot is going to be closed.
data_value.cur_loc_fav: Your current location is added to Favorites

data_value.delete_all_recent_stops: Are you sure you want to clear all recent stops?

data_value.delete_single_data_region_msg: Are you sure that you want to delete this map?
data_value.download_queue_read_fail: CoPilot was unable to recover 1 or more of your previous downloads.
data_value.dpi_settings_eu: Place a 5 Euro cent coin over the circle and use the buttons to make the circle larger or smaller to fit the coin.
data_value.dpi_settings_na: Place a penny over the circle and use the buttons to make the circle larger or smaller to fit the coin.
data_value.dpi_settings_uk: Place a 1p coin over the circle and use the buttons to make the circle larger or smaller to fit the coin.
data_value.email_arival_time: My estimated time of arrival is %s
data_value.email_my_destination_greeting: Here are the details of my route which I planned using the CoPilot V9 app:
data_value.email_recommend_msg_2: Hello, I'd like to recommend a great navigation app that I use to find my way around called CoPilot. It gives me turn-by-turn directions on the road or on foot, with detailed street maps, voice guidance, trip planning features and the best route to wherever I need to go.
data_value.email_support_subject: Try out this great navigation software
data_value.fb_friends_empty: No recent check ins found. Tap Check In to view nearby places.
data_value.fb_places_empty: There are no nearby places to check in to.
data_value.flow_detour_none: Unable to calculate a better detour at this time.
data_value.flow_detour_time_later_f: Estimated Detour Time:^## minutes later (## <<DistUnit:P>> farther)
data_value.flow_detour_time_later_s: Estimated Detour Time:^## minutes later (## <<DistUnit:P>> shorter)
data_value.flow_detour_time_sf: Estimated Detour Time:^## minutes sooner (## <<DistUnit:P>> farther)
data_value.flow_detour_time_ss: Estimated Detour Time:^## minutes sooner (## <<DistUnit:P>> shorter)
data_value.free_buy_now_desc: Includes Voice Guidance, 3D maps, Safety & Itinerary views, Live Fuel Prices, Live Local Search, Multi-stop & Quick stop trip routing, Music Player Control and MORE!^^You will be notified when your 30 day trial expires and there will be no charges incurred to you at the end of the trial.
data_value.gps_search_succeeded: GPS driver found! GPS Setup is complete.
data_value.hazmat_restricted: CoPilot has identified this road as a hazardous material restriction. Always obey locally posted regulations
data_value.incorrect_sso_info: SSO account not found or incorrect old password.
data_value.internal_startup_msg_0: I'm sorry%s. I'm afraid I can't do that.
data_value.internal_startup_msg_3: Traveling with CoPilot ain't like dusting crops%s!
data_value.internal_startup_msg_4: Roads? Where we're going, we don't need roads.
data_value.internal_startup_msg_5: I am CoPilot. Hear me Roar!
data_value.internal_startup_msg_6: Come with me if you want to live.
data_value.invalid_os_grid_msg: The OS Grid data you entered is not recognizable.
data_value.invalid_profile_name: Invalid profile name. Please try something else.
data_value.iphone_lbs_disabled: Location Services are currently turned OFF. Please enable Location Services in General Settings.
data_value.language_pico_download: You don't have Android's free text-to-speech engine, which allows CoPilot to speak street names. Click OK to go to the Android Market and get it.
data_value.language_pico_download_setup: (If you do, CoPilot will automatically select this engine for you when it finishes installing.)
data_value.lcz_route_in_london_zone: Your route passes through the London Congestion Zone. Would you like to avoid it?
data_value.lcz_route_in_zone: Your route passes through a restricted access zone. Would you like to calculate a detour?
data_value.lcz_stop_in_london_zone: Your stop is in the London Congestion Zone.
data_value.lcz_stop_in_zone: Your stop is in a restricted access zone.
data_value.lez_route_in_zone: Your route passes through an Environmental Zone. Would you like to avoid it?
data_value.lez_stop_in_zone: Your stop is in an Environmental Zone.
data_value.lic_act_failed: Error generating activation code for the Product Key you supplied.
data_value.lic_act_grace_period: You must activate your CoPilot within ## days via mobile Internet (recommended) or on a desktop computer.
data_value.lic_act_grace_period_done: You must activate your CoPilot via mobile Internet (recommended) or on a desktop computer.
data_value.lic_act_grace_period_multi: You must activate each of your CoPilot product keys via mobile Internet (recommended) or on a desktop computer.
data_value.lic_act_grace_period_oneday: You must activate your CoPilot within 1 day via mobile Internet (recommended) or on a desktop computer.
data_value.lic_act_invalid_credentials: Incorrect CoPilot ID username or password. Need a password reminder? Visit <<http://my.copilotlive.com>> and click on 'Forgot your password?'.
data_value.lic_act_invalid_email: You have used characters within your email address that we cannot support. Please use a different email address.
data_value.lic_act_invalid_pwd: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
data_value.lic_act_notice_msg: Please note that you will not be able to restore your In-App purchases if you do not create a CoPilot ID.
data_value.lic_act_pk_expired_trial: Sorry! Your CoPilot Live Trial Has Expired.
data_value.lic_act_pk_in_use: Product key is already in use on another device. Please first deactivate CoPilot from your other device.
data_value.lic_act_pk_unknown: The Product Key you have supplied is not valid.
data_value.lic_act_pwd_mismatch: Your passwords do not match. Please try again.
data_value.lic_act_user_exists: The user name provided already exists. Please try a different user name.
data_value.lic_act_user_not_exists: The user name provided does not exist.
data_value.lic_base_key_required_text: An upgrade key may not be used until a full product key is provided. Please provide a full product key.
data_value.lic_data_invalid_text_1: The data in use is not properly licensed. Tap > to provide a data upgrade license.
data_value.lic_data_invalid_text_2: An unlicensed map has been found. You may need to restore an existing license for it in the Features and Upgrades section. Tap Next to enter copilot.
data_value.lic_deact_checkmsg: Please check your connection or try manual deactivation.
data_value.lic_deact_note: Note: If you need to transfer Copilot to another device, please ensure you deactivate it first before continuing. To Deactivate, go to MENU > Settings > Licensing > Deactivate.
data_value.lic_deact_success_text_1: Go to <<activate.alk.com>> to complete deactivation. Then tap Finish to quit CoPilot.
data_value.lic_help_1: CoPilot Live needs to connect to the Internet briefly to activate your trial. In doing so, data charges from your mobile provider may apply. CoPilot does not connect to the mobile Internet for navigation or to provide guidance.
data_value.lic_help_2: At the end of your CoPilot trial we will contact you at the e-mail address provided to explain how you can continue using CoPilot navigation. Personal information that you provide to ALK Technologies is retained by us for the sole purpose of keeping you informed about the latest CoPilot software and mapping updates, product announcements, special offers, and other related information. We take your privacy very seriously and will not share your personal information with 3rd parties without your prior consent.
data_value.lic_help_3: Enter your Product Key. This is a 25 character code located either on a Product Key card, Printed Label or, sent to you via e-mail.
data_value.lic_help_4a: Your CoPilot ID:^^Allows you access to CoPilot's Live services.^Ensures you receive information on software and map updates available to you.^Helps us identify you if you lose your device, need to replace it or upgrade to a new one.
data_value.lic_help_4b: ^Allows you to purchase additional features and upgrades from within the app.
data_value.lic_help_4c: ^^Your CoPilot ID is completely confidential and will not be used for any other purposes. You will only need to log in with your CoPilot ID this first time.
data_value.lic_help_5: You need to have a WiFi connection in order to download large files.
data_value.lic_help_6: You must activate your CoPilot product key in order to continue using CoPilot. The easiest way to activate is automatically via the mobile Internet. If automatic activation does not work, please try again or check that your mobile device can connect to the Internet. Alternatively you can activate via the CoPilot activation web site <<http://activate.alk.com>>.
data_value.lic_help_7: Deactivation instructions can be found at <<http://www.copilotlive.com/userguide>>.
data_value.lic_help_9: If you have forgotten your CoPilot ID, please contact support at <<http://support.copilotlive.com>>.
data_value.lic_help_10: Instructions for Deactivation can be found at <<http://www.copilotlive.com/userguide>>.
data_value.lic_help_text: For further assistance, please contact support at <<http://support.copilotlive.com>>.
data_value.lic_illegal_device_msg: This version of CoPilot cannot be run on your device.
data_value.lic_man_act_failed: Tap < to confirm that you entered the Activation Code correctly.
data_value.lic_pk_confused: Verify you have entered each character correctly. For example S instead of 5 or 8 instead of B.
data_value.lic_pk_duplicate_text: This product key is already in use. Please enter a new product key.
data_value.lic_pk_error_text: The Product Key entered is not valid. Please recheck your Product Key and try again.
data_value.lic_popup_store: This is a feature upgrade. Would you like to learn more?
data_value.lic_popup_store_free: This is a FREE bonus feature – would you like to activate it now?
data_value.lic_traffic_invalid: ActiveTraffic cannot be activated with this version of CoPilot
data_value.limit_exceeded: Your daily search limit exceeded. Please try again later.
data_value.live_data_charges: Enabling wireless communications may incur wireless data charges through your mobile provider.
data_value.live_signup: Go to <<http://live.alk.com>> to sign up for an account if you want to use the messaging and online tracking features.
data_value.live_wireless_required: Wireless internet capability is required on this device to enable communication.
data_value.livelink_err_1_per_acct: Only 1 vehicle per consumer account allowed!
data_value.livelink_err_acct_conflict: Live account conflict. Please contact technical support.

data_value.no_fix_routing_from_last_pos: No GPS fix: routing from last known position

data_value.no_results: There are no results to display. Try including more information in your search.

data_value.not_at_start_location: You are currently not at your selected start location:
data_value.ota_base_download: We need to download a few files to get you started with OnDemand Maps. This should only take a few minutes.
data_value.ota_connect_error: CoPilot encountered errors connecting to the internet. Please check your connection and try again.
data_value.ota_connect_wifionly: CoPilot requires a WiFi connection to download large files. Please check your connection and try again.
data_value.ota_download_confirm: Are you sure you want to download %s?
data_value.ota_download_in_progress: CoPilot is downloading. Please wait until the current download is completed.
data_value.ota_downloading_ok: Your download is in progress. Press OK to proceed.
data_value.ota_first_map: Your first map has finished downloading. You can now use CoPilot Live.
data_value.ota_google_order_fail_723: CoPilot could not verify your purchase with the Android Market. Please check your Internet connection and try again. If the problem persists, check that the device's account has purchased this product and that you are currently logged in to the Play Store by opening up the Play Store
data_value.ota_google_order_fail_725: CoPilot could not connect to the Android Market to verify your purchase. Please check your Internet connection and try again. If the problem persists, please try restarting your device
data_value.ota_insufficient_memory: There is not enough available space to download this content to %s. ## MB available, ## MB required.
data_value.ota_insufficient_memory_apple: There is not enough available space to download this content to your device. ## MB available, ## MB required.
data_value.ota_map_are_you_sure: You have selected %s. Are you sure?
data_value.ota_map_interrupted: Error downloading map. Restart CoPilot to resume your download.
data_value.ota_map_no_connection: Could not connect to the server, please check your settings and try again.
data_value.ota_map_no_internet: No internet connection detected, please check your settings and try again.
data_value.ota_map_resume_cell: WiFi not detected. Would you like to resume download using cellular data?
data_value.ota_map_resume_wifi: CoPilot closed before it completed its last download. Would you like to continue with this download now?
data_value.ota_map_set_list_error: Error updating the Map List. Please try again later.
data_value.ota_map_unavailable: Map unavailable for download, please select a different region.
data_value.ota_necessary_dl_error: CoPilot encountered an error downloading a necessary file. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
data_value.ota_no_location: Error: No GPS fix or previous location
data_value.ota_not_licensed: You are not currently licensed to download this map.
data_value.ota_on_demand_preload_startup: Before you can begin navigating with CoPilot Live, you'll need to select and download maps to use. CoPilot Live stores all your maps on-board your device so you can navigate offline without having to rely on your mobile connection.
data_value.ota_on_demand_startup_disconnected: INTERNET CONNECTION NOT FOUND!^^Try again shortly
data_value.ota_on_demand_streaming_startup: CoPilot can now download and store your map data as you use the app. You can also preload map sets at anytime.
data_value.ota_on_demand_update: In this update we've improved how CoPilot stores maps on your iPhone/iPad.^Now you can store just the maps you need on your device, and install app updates more easily.^^Before you start navigating, you need to first download your chosen maps via WiFi (recommended) or 3G.
data_value.ota_quit_while_downloading: CoPilot is currently downloading %s data. Are you sure that you want to exit?
data_value.ota_region_confirm_message: You will be licensed for this map region only and will not be able to change it later. Tap continue to download the entire map region or select a smaller region to save space.^^Additional map regions are available via in-app purchase.
data_value.ota_region_confirm_message_eu: Tap continue to select and download a map of one European country or region for free.^^Please note: once you have chosen one free country map you will not be able to change it later. You can buy additional map regions via in app purchase.
data_value.ota_soap_error: The action could not be completed

data_value.ota_unpack_progress_text: CoPilot is currently unpacking downloaded data.

data_value.trial_expires_soon_get_subscription: Get your monthly CoPilot subscription from
data_value.trial_expires_soon_tap_next: ^^Select 'Cancel' to continue using CoPilot or 'Next' to enter your license
data_value.trial_soon_buy_subscription: Don't get stranded without sat-nav. Buy a Full CoPilot Live license today.

data_value.voice_open_market: You will be taken to the Android Market to purchase this voice. The download will include instructions on how to set up your voice in Android's TTS settings. After following these instructions, please restart CoPilot.
data_value.voice_tts_download_extended: You must download TTS Extended from the Android Market before you can use this voice. Click OK to get it.

data_value.walk_mode_dist_warning: Your trip distance exceeds normal walking distance. Would you like to change your Mode of Travel?

data_value.wiki_zoom: Zoom in to see Wikipedia locations
data_value.windows_lbs_disabled: Please go to your system settings and turn on location services in order to use your GPS.
data_value.windows_lbs_request: We need to use location services so that we can show your exact location on the map using GPS.\n\nLocation services can be switched off at any time via the My Account > Privacy Settings menu.
